WRITING.TEXT: Yes!! I took my dog to the big dog park one day. This man had his two small kids with him. This little girl started running and my dog jumped up on her and knocked her over. She was stunned at first and then started laughing. After apologizing I still got the nastiest look and no response. My dog does have experience with kids. He's good with them but when they run around him and yell he thinks it's time to play.
We love Kobe! He's a good boy for being there for his mommy. I hope you find peace amp; happiness and that your douchebag ex gets his karma. You deserve better.
